autoresponses.descr: If it's on, the bot will respond with preprogrammed messages when a keyword is said. Use `l.settings autoresponses` to see the preprogrammed messages.

bible.descr: If it's on, the command will work. Use `l.help bible` for more information.

dino.descr: If it's on, the command will work.
